answers.answer: I only felt nauseated, over heated and very hungry. The 3 hour glucose test was even worse.
Do you know why these symptoms happen after?? Luckily I passed so I don't have to do the 3 hour one. I just feel like poop!
Probably just the way your body handles that much sugar. Like I said, the 3 hour was a lot worse :(
That makes sense.. I hope it stops soon..
If it doesn't, maybe call your doc. My symptoms improved after eating.
This happened to me. I had mine today too. Just had diarrhea Lol sorry. But now I feel fine.

Definitely will if it doesn't stop. Lol I have had diarrhea twice. When I came home I threw up and then took a 4 hour nap now my head is pounding, I'm trying to eat something but this nausea is worse than morning sickness.. right after I drank it i felt like I could run around the world a million times. Now I feel like I can't even move my leg without being super exhausted!
Maybe try drinking a small glass of milk? Or a bottle of plain water.
I also threw mine up on the nurse. Lol.
Drinking  a lot of water helped me feel better. That was a horrible test glad I passed.
What's the point of the test if all you're going to do is throw it up?! I don't understand why they would do something to make you even more sick! :(

My hospital said the test is null if you throw up before the hour is up and they'll make you do the 3 hour. I'm sure every hospital is diff though. They do the test to make sure you don't have gestational diabetes, which can cause serious ccomplications

Yeah that's what I thought. The test is pointless if you can't keep it down. Yeah my blood sugar keeps dropping but I passed so I guess I just need to eat every 10 minutes instead of every 20 minutes...
Like I said before, maybe try drinking some milk, chocolate milk if you prefer, just not too much cause of the sugar level unless you make it with nesquick lol
Definitely will try. Thank you very much!

question: Did any of you ladies who has done it had any negative symptoms after doing this test? I did mine today and have been having really string contractions still 8 minutes apart though. Very nauseous if I am not eating constantly. Extremely tired... and extremely gassy. Headaches, chills. Anyone else???
title: the one hour test symptoms after!?
